meanings.definition: Jujitsus (noun): A Japanese martial art involving self-defense techniques.
meanings.sent1: She learned jujitsus to protect herself from harm.
meanings.sent2: He has been studying jujitsus for years and has become very skilled.
meanings.sent3: During the jujitsus class, they accidentally tripped over each other while practicing.
meanings.sent4: Her quick reflexes in a difficult situation were like jujitsus in action.
meanings.sent5: The jujitsus moves were so graceful and powerful, they left everyone in awe.

meanings.definition: Jujitsus (verb): To practice or engage in jujitsu.
meanings.sent1: They regularly jujitsus in the dojo to improve their skills.
meanings.sent2: I want to jujitsus more often to stay in shape and build confidence.
meanings.sent3: After work, they like to jujitsus as a way to unwind and destress.
meanings.sent4: His ability to jujitsus effectively showed in the tournament.
meanings.sent5: She decided to jujitsus daily to become more disciplined and focused.
